item.title: flexia
item.dc:creator: Rupok

item.title: Installing Flexia
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Installation:

  • Go to Appearance > Themes from WordPress Dashboard
  • Click on "Add New Theme"
  • Search "Flexia" and install.

item.title: Installing Flexia Core
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Flexia Core is a recommended plugin for Flexia theme that controls all the plugin territory functionality for Flexia. You should use this with Flexia to get maximum features.

Installing Flexia Core:

Way #1

  • Go to Appearance > Install Plugins page from WordPress Dashboard
  • You will see the option to install recommended plugins
  • Select Flexia Core and install.

Way #2

  • Go to Plugins page from WordPress Dashboard
  • Click on Add New Plugin
  • Search Flexia Core and install.

item.title: Set site logo and icons
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Settings Logo and Icons for your site :

  1. Login to your WordPress Dashboard
  2. Go to Appearance > Customizer from your WordPress Dashboard
  3. Go to General Settings > Site Name and Description
  4. Upload logo image and icon image for your site.
  Follow the recommended size to get best result. Logo should be horizontal like 250x80 and Icon should be 512x512 resolution.

Adjust Logo Width :

  1. Go to Customize > Header >Logo width (px) and set logo width.
  2. Adjust the width to get best result for your site.

item.title: Setting up Home and Blog pages
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
1. Login to your WordPress Dashboard
  2. Create a page for "Home" and another for "Blog"
  3. Go to Settings > Reading from your WordPress Dashboard.
  4. Check "A static page (select below)"
  5. Select your Home page and Blog page like the screenshot below.

item.title: Layout Settings
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded: You can set your site layout, width and maximum width of the content, Sidebar width etc. from Layout Settings. Go to Customize > Layout and adjust the settings for your site.

item.title: Design Settings
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
You will find all design related settings under Customize > Design. [caption id="attachment_832" align="alignnone" width="685"] Current screenshot of "Design Settings". It might be different with more options.[/caption]

Header Image :

You can upload a header image that will be shown as Blog header background image. Also if you don't have Featured Image set for your post, it will work as fallback image in case you set "Large Header" for your post layout. Make sure to upload a larger resolution image (i.e. 1200x800) for better view.

Overlay Search :

You can change the design of "Overlay Search" that you can enable from Customize > Header > Enable Search Menu. You will find all necessary option to design the overlay search popup.

Background Styles:

You can set background image and color for your site. Usually it will be applied to your page body. You can also control the Page and Post content background colors.

item.title: Color & Typography
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded: You can control your site color and typography from Customize > Color & Typography You can set body font color, font family, font size and colors for links.

item.title: Header Settings
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Flexia offers you a very flexible header that you can customize like anything. You can control Topbar, Header Widgets, Navbar, Menu etc. from here. Go to Customize > Header to see all the options.

Navbar Settings :

You can set logo text color, logo width, Navbar position, Logobar position etc. from Navbar Settings.

Navbar Menu Settings :

You can control the color of your menu items and enable "Search Menu" and "WooCommerce Cart" menu. [caption id="attachment_843" align="alignnone" width="575"] Screenshot might be different than your screen as we are adding more features.[/caption]

Topbar Settings :

You can enable an additional Topbar for your site to show certain information. It's helpful if you want to show a temporary notice or promotional offers, no need for an extra plugin for that. You can also enable Topbar Menu that supports dropdown and which is responsive for mobile. You can also set social icons as menu item to link to your social profiles. There is also a "Header Widget" area. If you enable this, you will see a dropdown option on top right corner of your site. Dropdown will show the widgets that you can set from Appearance > Widgets > Header Widgets.

item.title: Footer Settings
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded: Flexia offers a very flexible footer for your site. You can customize your Footer from Customize > Footer You can enable/disable bottom footer (that contains the copyright information or any text/HTML your provide). You can enable Footer widgets and set the widgets from Appearance > Widgets > Footer Widgets. Note that Footer Content supports HTML, so you can place anything there. Flexia is a white label theme and it won't force you to keep the credit link but it would be nice if you do so. :) You will see lots other options to configure here such as "Scroll to Top", "Footer Menu" and so on. Flexia gives you the control to configure them completely.

item.title: Blog Settings
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Flexia offers a modern blog for your site that you can configure from Customize > Blog Styles. You will see multiple sections organized under the Blog Styles panel. Blog Content Settings : You can set Content Display to show full post content or excerpt only on blog page. Also you can control the excerpt length to create more organized layout with equal height and width. There are lots of option available in Pro version such as Ajax load more, Masonry grid, Flexbox Grid, Category filter and more.

Blog Header Settings :

You can configure the large header for your blog page. You can show withe an Font Awesome Icon or your custom image and control the width. You can also set a custom title and description for your blog. If you leave them empty, your site name and description will show here.

Single Post Settings :

You can set the default post layout (global) from Customizer. You can also control these settings for individual posts from Flexia Post Settings under the post editor screen for each post. Take control over the single post width, max width and show/hide Navigation, Author info and Social Sharing options. Complete freedom to customize your single posts.

item.title: Menu Settings
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Flexia has three menu locations for Header, Topbar and Footer. You can customize the menus from Customize > Menus or from Appearance > Menus.

Primary Menu :

Primary Menu will be shown on your Navbar which is the main navigation. It supports dropdown and responsive for mobile. It switches to mobile menu under 768px screen resolution.

Topbar Menu :

Topbar Menu will be shown on your Topbar that you can enable from Customize > Header. It is optional navigation you can disable the menu separately from Topbar if you want. It also supports dropdown and responsive for mobile. It switches to mobile menu under 768px screen resolution.

Footer Menu :

Footer Menu will be shown on your Footer that you can enable from Customize > Footer. It is optional navigation you can disable the menu separately from Footer if you want. It doesn't supports dropdown but responsive for mobile. Note that it won't be a toggle for mobile like Primary or Topbar menus rather will be inline yet responsive for mobile. You can also set menus within any widget on any widget areas (Sidebar Widgets, Header Widgets or Footer Widgets).

item.title: Widgets Settings
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded: Flexia has 10 widget areas that you can configure wither from Customize > Widgets or Appearance > Widgets You can set different widgets for Left and Right Sidebars, 4 different footer widget areas and 4 for header widgets areas that gives you ultimate flexibility to display contents in different areas.

item.title: Adding Custom JavaScripts
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded: You can add custom JavaScript code within Customize > Custom JavaScript. You can add Header Script and Footer Script separately. This feature is controlled by Flexia Core plugin. Make sure you have Flexia Core installed. Refer to this article to get help installing Flexia Core. Note : Place your scripts without script tag. Script tag will be added automatically after validating your scripts through CodeMirror.

item.title: Adding Google Analytics Code
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded: You can add your Google Anaytics code within Customize > Custom JavaScript > Google Analytics. This feature is controlled by Flexia Core plugin. Make sure you have Flexia Core installed. Refer to this article to get help installing Flexia Core. Note that you need to place the code as is with the script tag same as like the screenshot above. Find the instruction here to set up your Google Analytics.

item.title: Adding Custom CSS
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded: WordPress has the option to add custom CSS to your site. So you can just go to Customize > Additional CSS and place your custom CSS.

item.title: Page Settings
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
You can control Page Settings from Customizer > Design > Page Settings :  

Individual Page Control :

Page Settings under each page (under the editor) enable you to take control over any specific page. Currently it has few options but we will add more options eventually. It's controlled by Flexia Core plugin, so make sure to install Flexia Core from Appearance > Install Plugins.  

Options :

Additional Body Classes : You can add additional body classes that will be added to document body (body tag). You can use the class to add page specific CSS. Page Header: By default, it will take the Customizer settings. You can overwrite this fro each page from this option. If you want to hide the Title, set "No Header". Note that you might see the screen a bit different as we are still improving this a lot and adding new features.

item.title: Posts Settings
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Post Settings enable you to take control over any specific post. It's controlled by Flexia Core plugin, so make sure to install Flexia Core from Appearance > Install Plugins.  

Options :

Additional Body Classes : You can add additional body classes that will be added to document body (body tag). You can use the class to add page specific CSS. Post Layout : You can set different header layout for each post. Currently we have 3 styles and we'll add more styles eventually. Others : You can enable or disable certain elements for the specific post. Go to your post and see how it looks. Note that you might see the screen a bit different as we are still improving this a lot and adding new features.

item.title: How to set transparent header
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Flexia offers you a very flexible header that you can customize like anything. You can set four different type of Navbar poitions. Go to Customize > Header to see all the options.

Navbar Settings :

You can set Transparent Static Top or Transparent Sticky Top to get transparent Navbar. Transparent Static Top will be on top of your page and when you scroll down, it will still be there. For Transparent Sticky Top, it will be sticky with white (or whatever background color you set from Customizer) on scroll.

item.title: How to set sticky header
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Flexia offers you a very flexible header that you can customize like anything. You can set four different type of Navbar poitions. Go to Customize > Header to see all the options.

Navbar Settings :

You can set Sticky Top or Transparent Sticky Top to get transparent (with or without Sticky) Navbar. Sticky Top will always have background color (that you set as "Navbar Background" from Customizer). But for Transparent Sticky Top, it will be transparent initially and then with the background color when it's sticky on scroll.

item.title: How to set treansparent and sticky header together
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded: Flexia offers you a very flexible header that you can customize like anything. You can set four different type of Navbar poitions. Go to Customize > Header to see all the options. You can set Transparent Sticky Top to get transparent and sticky Navbar. It will be transparent initially and then with the background color when it's sticky on scroll. You can set the background color for "Navbar Background" from Customizer.

item.title: How to set stacked Logobar and Navbar
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Flexia offers two type of Navbar/Logobar arrangement. You can set either Inline Logobar or Stacked Logobar. Go to Customize > Header to see the option :  

Inline Logobar :

Logo will be inline with your menu items within the single Navbar.

Stacked Logobar :

Logobar will be stacked above the Navbar.

item.title: How to enable Header widgets
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded: Go to Customize > Header > Header Widget Area and check on "Enable Header Widget Area" You will see the Toggle at top right corner of your site : You can add widgets from Appearance > Widgets > Header Widgets.

item.title: How to enable footer content
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded: You can change your footer content from Customize > Footer > Footer Content. Footer Content field supports HTML, so you can place anything there.

item.title: How to change page title style
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded: You can set several Page Title style for your pages individually. You will find them under Page Settings on your page editor screen. Page and Post Settings are controlled by Flexia Core plugin. Make sure you have the plugin installed. Refer to this article to get help installing Flexia Core.

item.title: How to change post title style
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded: You can set your global Post Title style from Customize > Blog Style > Single Post Settings You can controls this for each posts individually. You will find them under Post Settings on your post editor screen. Page and Post Settings are controlled by Flexia Core plugin. Make sure you have the plugin installed. Refer to this article to get help installing Flexia Core.

item.title: I can't see Page/Post Settings under editor
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Page and Post Settings are controlled by Flexia Core plugin. Make sure you have the plugin installed.

Installing Flexia Core:

Way #1

  • Go to Appearance > Install Plugins page from WordPress Dashboard
  • You will see the option to install recommended plugins
  • Select Flexia Core and install.

Way #2

  • Go to Plugins page from WordPress Dashboard
  • Click on Add New Plugin
  • Search Flexia Core and install.

item.title: I can't see Custom JavaScript option
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
You can place custom JavaScripts under Customize > Custom JavaScripts and this feature is controlled by Flexia Core plugin. Make sure you have Flexia Core installed. Also make sure your WordPress version is greater than 4.9. Since we are using integrated CodeMirror editor which is available from WordPress 4.9, it won't show the option if you are using older WordPress on your site.

Installing Flexia Core:

Way #1

  • Go to Appearance > Install Plugins page from WordPress Dashboard
  • You will see the option to install recommended plugins
  • Select Flexia Core and install.

Way #2

  • Go to Plugins page from WordPress Dashboard
  • Click on Add New Plugin
  • Search Flexia Core and install.

item.title: Recommended Plugins
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded: Flexia recommends some great plugins for your site to speed up your development. None of these are required for Flexia to work rather listed for your convenience. You can find them under Flexia > Recommended Plugins and install what you need. Note that most of the plugins are third-party but as recommended, we ensure the compatibility with Flexia. All of them should work flawlessly with Flexia.

item.title: Setting up Header
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded: Video walkthrough coming soon. Meantime check Customize > Header for all options.

item.title: How to hide page title for a page/post
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded: You will see "Show Page Title" option under Page Settings on your page editor screen. Check Yes/No to show/hide Page Title for specific page. Page and Post Settings are controlled by Flexia Core plugin. Make sure you have the plugin installed. Refer to this article to get help installing Flexia Core.

item.title: Container
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Add container (different max-width for various screen size)

[container]
	[row]
		[column md="6"]
			...
		[/column]
		[column md="6"]
			...
		[/column]
	[/row
[/container]
Double click on code to see raw and then copy

Add container-fluid (100% width container)

[container-fluid]
	[container]
		[row]
			[column md="6"]
				...
			[/column]
			[column md="6"]
				...
			[/column]
		[/row]
	[/container]
[/container-fluid]
Double click on code to see raw and then copy

Parameters ([container] )

Parameter Description Required Values Default
fluid Is the container fluid? (see Bootstrap documentation for details) optional true, false false
xclass Any extra classes you want to add optional any text none
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. optional any text none

Parameters ([container-fluid])

Parameter Description Required Values Default
xclass Any extra classes you want to add optional any text none
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text none

Container and Row example with parameteres :

[container fluid="true"]
	[row xclass="flexia-container" data="some-data"]
		[column md="6"]
			...
		[/column]
		[column md="6"]
			...
		[/column]
	[/row]
[/container]
Double click on code to see raw and then copy

item.title: Row
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Row Shortcode :

[row]
	[column md="6"]
		...
	[/column]
	[column md="6"]
		...
	[/column]
[/row]

Parameters

Parameter Description Required Values Default
xclass Any extra classes you want to add optional any text none
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text none

Container and Row example with parameteres :

[container fluid="true"]
	[row xclass="flexia-container" data="some-data"]
		[column md="6"]
			...
		[/column]
		[column md="6"]
			...
		[/column]
	[/row]
[/container]
Double click on code to see raw and then copy

item.title: Columns
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Column Shortcode :

[container]
	[row]
		[column md="4"]
			...
		[/column]
		[column md="4"]
			...
		[/column]
	[/row]
[/container]

Parameters

Parameter Description Required Values Default
xs Size of column on extra small screens (less than 576px) optional 1-12 false
sm Size of column on small screens (greater than 576px) optional 1-12 false
md Size of column on medium screens (greater than 720px) optional 1-12 false
lg Size of column on large screens (greater than 960px) optional 1-12 false
xl Size of column on extra large screens (greater than 1140px) optional 1-12 false
offset_xs Offset on extra small screens optional 1-12 false
offset_sm Offset on small screens optional 1-12 false
offset_md Offset on column on medium screens optional 1-12 false
offset_lg Offset on column on large screens optional 1-12 false
offset_xl Offset on column on extra large screens optional 1-12 false
order_xs Order on extra small screens optional 1-12 false
order_sm Order on small screens optional 1-12 false
order_md Order on column on medium screens optional 1-12 false
order_lg Order on column on large screens optional 1-12 false
order_xl Order on column on extra large screens optional 1-12 false
xclass Any extra classes you want to add optional any text none
data Data attribute and value pairs separated by a comma. Pairs separated by pipe. optional any text none

Columns example with parameteres :

[container]
	[row]
		[column md="4" xs="6" order-xs="2"]
			...
		[/column]
		[column md="4" xs="6" order-xs="1"]
			...
		[/column]
	[/row]
[/container]
Double click on code to see raw and then copy

item.title: Setting up Advanced Blog
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Flexia Pro offers advanced Blog feature to create Blog page with ease. Go to Customize > Blog Styles to configure your blog page. You will see the options to configure Blog Header, Blog Content and Single Posts. Go to Blog Content Settings to configure the content and layout for your blog page : You will also see the options to control all the styling :

Customize Single Posts

You can go to Customize > Blog Styles > Single Posts Settings to take control over post layout. This is global settings and you can override this settings from "Post Settings" of each post, individually.

item.title: Setting up Portfolio
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Flexia Pro includes advanced Portfolio feature so you can set up a stunning Portfolio page.

Setting up Portfolio Page

Create a new page assign the Page Template "Flexia Portfolio"   Publish the page and you will see "Flexia Portfolio Settings" under the editor where you can configure the portfolio page layout: This page will show all your Portfolio. You can select the categories to show specific portfolios and enable category filter, popup, masonry etc.

Creating Portfolio

Portfolios are custom post types and you can create them from WordPress Dashboard > Portfolio

Customizing Portfolio Page Style

To customize the styles, go to Customize > Portfolio and you will see all the options to change styles. You can change the single portfolio slug, show/hide breadcrumbs and navigation and take control over all the styling.

Frequently Asked Questions

  • Edit Widget
  • Duplicate Widget
  • Save Widget
  • Remove Widget
How many sites can I use Flexia Pro?

You can install Flexia Pro on unlimited websites.

How do I get updates?

You will get automatic update for Flexia from wp.org. If Flexia Pro is validated, you will get the automatic update in the same way, right from your WordPress Dashboard.

What is the difference between "Annual" and "Lifetime"?

For annual license, you will receive premium support and automatic updates for 1 year. You will need to renew your license to avail them. For lifetime license, you get everything for lifetime!

What if I don't renew my annual license?

If you don’t renew, you won’t get the premium support and automatic updates. But you can always get the latest version from your account, download them and update manually.

  • Edit Widget
  • Duplicate Widget
  • Save Widget
  • Remove Widget
Do you offer Money back guarantee?

Yes, we offer 14 Days money back guarantee. If you don’t like Flexia Pro, you can ask for a refund.

How do I get support?

A license of Flexia Pro entitles you a premium support. You can get support through live chat and support ticket.

item.title: Preloader
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Go to Flexia > Modules from your WordPress Dashboard and activate "Preloader" You will see the preloader on your site if you load any page.

Customizing Preloader

You can customize the prealoder style from Customize > Preloader It's really easy to customize the prealoder. You can set the background color and use your own preloader image (SVG or GIF). There are lots of websites from where you can get or create your own loading image for free. You can check the below websites to get your customized loading image : https://loading.io/ https://icons8.com/preloaders/

item.title: WooCommerce
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded: WooCommerce module and documentation is getting ready.

item.title: Under Maintenance
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
You can put your site to under maintenance mode when you are developing your site and don't want people to see the unfinished site. It's also helpful if you need to put it under maintenance for a while when something is broken or needs an upgrade. You can activate this module from Flexia > Modules from your WordPress Dashboard :

Customizing Under Maintenance Page

After activating the module, click on "Customize" link and you will see the configuration options : You can set the title, tagline, description, background image and set the launching date to get beautiful cowntdown.

item.title: Installing Flexia Pro

item.content:encoded: Flexia Pro is a plugin that adds extra features to Flexia theme. So you need to install Flexia Pro as a plugin. You can download Flexia Pro plugin from your WPDeveloper.net account.

item.title: Flexia LP – 23 Oct 2019
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
The Flexible WordPress Theme

Create Anything. Customize Everything

Explore Get Started

Unlimited Possibilities For Your Website

Fully Customizable Multi Themes for Developers and Designers

Flexible & Powerful

Customize exactly the way you want through Customizer & Flexia Core plugin. Add individual control over each page & posts to make it versatile.

Modern & Lightweight

Create beautiful & modern web design with Flexia Multipurpose theme. Optimize your website for loading faster than any other website.

Responsive & Dynamic

Pixel perfect responsiveness with modern Flexbox and Bootstrap 4 grid to make it perfect responsiveness for all devices.

Unlock More Power : Go Pro!

Get more with Flexia Pro. World class support with lots of premium features!

Annual Lifetime

Flexia Theme

$00

/lifetime

  • All Theme Features
  • Lifetime Update from wp.org
  • SEO Friendly
  • Ecommerce Ready
  • White Label
  • Page Builder Friendly
Get Started

Flexia Pro

$249

/lifetime

  • Unlimited Websites
  • Lifetime Update & Support
  • Advanced Blog
  • Advanced Portfolio
  • All Pro Extensions
  • 30 Days Money Back Guarantee
Get Started

See Why Customers Love Flexia

Versatile and modern looking. The Flexia theme is simple to use which is nice I have Visual Composer page builder installed and it works well with Flexia. The theme has enough adaptability to work with numerous plugins and get the exact look youre going for in your website. Philip Clark Amazing theme. Its a pretty good theme except for a few minor bugs. The themes with this quality are normally sold with money. I especially liked the menu animations and mobile compatibility. Furkan Alar Less is more! Flexia is simple and objective, coupled with a good editor and can do everything you need, its layout is very good to read, in short, a great option! rrm32 Flexia is amazing and super easy to use theme, it works perfectly with page builders. it lets me control header/footer/sidebar without any restrictions. The best side is support. Flexia team responses were a perfect in my 2 previous experiences khaledelwakeel CEO Previous Next

Frequently Asked Questions

How many sites can I use Flexia Pro? You can install Flexia Pro on unlimited websites. How do I get updates?

You will get automatic update for Flexia from wp.org. If Flexia Pro is validated, you will get the automatic update in the same way, right from your WordPress Dashboard.

What is the difference between "Annual" and "Lifetime"?

For annual license, you will receive premium support and automatic updates for 1 year. You will need to renew your license to avail them. For lifetime license, you get everything for lifetime!

What if I don't renew my annual license?

If you don’t renew, you won’t get the premium support and automatic updates. But you can always get the latest version from your account, download them and update manually.

Do you offer Money back guarantee?

Yes, we offer 14 Days money back guarantee. If you don’t like Flexia Pro, you can ask for a refund.

How do I get support?

A license of Flexia Pro entitles you a premium support. You can get support through live chat and support ticket.

Have another question in mind?

No problem, you candrop us a line hereor initiate a live chat atWPDeveloper.

item.content:encoded:
The Flexible WordPress Theme

Create Anything. Customize Everything

See Demo Get Started

Unlimited Possibilities For Your Website

Fully Customizable Multi Themes for Developers and Designers

Flexible & Powerful

Customize exactly the way you want through Customizer & Flexia Core plugin. Add individual control over each page & posts to make it versatile.

Modern & Lightweight

Create beautiful & modern web design with Flexia Multipurpose theme. Optimize your website for loading faster than any other website.

Responsive & Dynamic

Pixel perfect responsiveness with modern Flexbox and Bootstrap 4 grid to make it perfect responsiveness for all devices.

Unlock More Power : Go Pro!

Get more with Flexia Pro. World class support with lots of premium features!

Get Started

See Why Customers Love Flexia

Versatile and modern looking. The Flexia theme is simple to use which is nice I have Visual Composer page builder installed and it works well with Flexia. The theme has enough adaptability to work with numerous plugins and get the exact look youre going for in your website. Philip Clark Amazing theme. Its a pretty good theme except for a few minor bugs. The themes with this quality are normally sold with money. I especially liked the menu animations and mobile compatibility. Furkan Alar Less is more! Flexia is simple and objective, coupled with a good editor and can do everything you need, its layout is very good to read, in short, a great option! rrm32 Flexia is amazing and super easy to use theme, it works perfectly with page builders. it lets me control header/footer/sidebar without any restrictions. The best side is support. Flexia team responses were a perfect in my 2 previous experiences khaledelwakeel CEO Previous Next

Frequently Asked Questions

How many sites can I use Flexia Pro? You can install Flexia Pro on unlimited websites. How do I get updates?

You will get automatic update for Flexia from wp.org. If Flexia Pro is validated, you will get the automatic update in the same way, right from your WordPress Dashboard.

What is the difference between "Annual" and "Lifetime"?

For annual license, you will receive premium support and automatic updates for 1 year. You will need to renew your license to avail them. For lifetime license, you get everything for lifetime!

What if I don't renew my annual license?

If you don’t renew, you won’t get the premium support and automatic updates. But you can always get the latest version from your account, download them and update manually.

Do you offer Money back guarantee?

Yes, we offer 14 Days money back guarantee. If you don’t like Flexia Pro, you can ask for a refund.

How do I get support?

A license of Flexia Pro entitles you a premium support. You can get support through live chat and support ticket.

Have another question in mind?

No problem, you candrop us a line hereor initiate a live chat atWPDeveloper.

item.title: Features
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Flexia is a true multi-purpose WordPress Theme
suitable to build any kind of websites

Flexia offers 100% flexibility to customize your website through WordPress Customizer and you can extend it with your Child Theme. 10+ different Page Templates give you the ability to achieve any kind of layout, best when you are using a Page Builder to design your page.

01

Flexible Header

Inline or Stacked Logobar position. Static Top, Sticky Top or Transparent Top Navbar for building flexible header.

Expand

You can choose different Logobar and Navbar position. You can set Static, Sticky or Transparent Navbar/Menubar right from the Customizer.

02

Flexible Layout

Set Left Sidebar, Right Sidebar or both sidebars together. You can also show just content without any sidebar.

Expand

We have built a really flexible layout to design your pages and posts according to your idea. Layout is based on Flexbox and naturally responsive for all devices. Choose page template from 10+ different layouts for each page and assign sidebar individually.

03

Flexible Footer

You can enable Footer widgets area, Footer Menu and Bottom Footer to place any content and style them.

Expand

You can enable Footer Widgets area and place unlimited widgets there. And additional Footer Menu to place the links and Bottom Footer to place any content like copyright info. Also a "Scroll To Top" link that you can enable for your site.

04

Advanced Topbar

Enable Topbar to show some content along with a Navigation Menu that supports dropdown and responsive for mobile.

Expand

You can use the Topbar to place additional content or promotional content for short time. It has an option to enable Navigation Menu which supports dropdown and perfectly responsive for mobile same as like the main navigation. You can use this as social menu as well with social icons. There is also a Topbar Widgets are that you can enable and place widgets.

05

Natural Responsiveness

Flexia uses Flexbox to create modern layout with natural responsiveness. Content and Sidebars get stacked naturally.

Expand

Flexia uses Flexbox to create modern layout with natural responsiveness. Content and Sidebars get stacked naturally where t should be. Like if you use left and right sidebar then those will be stacked side by side under the content for Tablets and will be fully stacked for mobile.

06

Flexible Blog

You can choose multiple layout for blog page as well as single posts. You read it right, different layout for each post.

Expand

Flexia gives you the flexibility to customize your blog page as well as the single posts. You can set large header, simple header or no header for your posts, individually from Post Settings that could be found under your post editor. You can select global layout from Customizer.

07

Overlay Search

You can set a beautiful overlay search for your website with Flexia. You an customize every bit of it.

Expand

An overlay search is a modern way to search on your website and Flexia has it for you. Just enable it from Customizer and you will see the search icon along with your menu items. You can customize the colors, typography and everything right from the Customizer, in a WordPress native way.

08

Typography Control

Control your typography right from the WordPress Customizer. Select any Google Font for body and headings.

Expand

You can set different Google Font for body and headings. Set the body font size and heading font sizes for each heading and set the link colors or whatever you need. Flexia is fully customizable through the Customizer, in a native WordPress way.

09

Amazing Menu

Flexia has three menus for Navbar, Topbar and Footer and all of them are responsive and top-notch design.

Expand

We have worked hard to create a perfect menu that works great on mobile devices and submenus are not confusing on mobile. Topbar menu also supports dropdown and responsive for mobile in the same way. You can also enable an additional Footer Menu from Customizer.

10

Shortcodes

We have bundled some essential shortcodes through Flexia Core plugin that you can install if you need them.

Expand

Shortcodes are still a handy feature of WordPress and we are offering the most useful ones like Row, Columns with lots of necessary parameters and it's based on Bootstrap 4 grid. Check them from here.

11

Custom JavaScripts

Add custom JavaScript or jQuery through Customizer and edit with integrated CodeMirror editor.

Expand

Flexia adds the ability to add Custom header and footer scripts individually through Flexia Core. You can place any custom JavaScript, Facebook Pixel or any kind of embed script, the safest way to add additional scripts on your site which is properly sanitized.

12

Google Analytics

You don't need another plugin to add Google Analytics code for your site. Add them right from the Customizer.

Expand

You can add Google Analytics code for your site from the WordPress Customizer, the safest way to add external code that get sanitized through CodeMirror editor and Flexia.

13

SEO Friendly

Flexia is fully SEO ready theme and has been developed keeping SEO in mind. Also compatible with all SEO plugins.

Expand

You can choose different Logobar and Navbar position. You can set Static, Sticky or Transparent Navbar/Menubar right from the Customizer.

14

Translation & RTL

As published through WordPress.org, Flexia is Translation ready and we are working to provide more language support.

Expand

As published through WordPress.org, Flexia is Translation ready and we are working to provide more language support. Also it's ready for Right to Left languages. You can also contribute for your language on wp.org or Flexia Github repository.

15

Secure & Stable

Flexia has been reviewed and approved on WordPress.org and follows the best coding practices to keep your site clean and secure.

Expand

Flexia is hosted on WordPress.org and follows the best practices of WordPress Theme Development. Rest assured the code behind your site is clean and efficient and we do updates regularly to keep it up to date.

16

EDD Ready

Seamless integration with Easy Digital Downloads. Build your digital product store with Flexia.

Expand

Flexia offers seamless integration with Easy Digital Downloads offering ajax add to cart, beautiful single download, cart page, checkout page design and more that gives you the power to build your digital store with Flexia along with your beautiful website.

17

WooCommerce Ready

Seamless integration with WooCommerce. Build your WooCommerce store with Flexia effortlessly.

Expand

Flexia offers seamless integration with WooCommerce offering ajax add to cart, beautiful shop, product page, cart page, checkout page design and more that gives you the power to build your digital store with Flexia along with your beautiful website.

18

Open Source

Flexia is an open source theme available on WordPress.org and developed on Github public repository.

Expand

We develop Flexia on Github and you can contribute on our Github repository to make it better. You can contribute to translate on your language on WordPress.org as well as we want to grow as a community.

Flexia Pro Features

Flexia Pro offers some cutting-edge feature to build stunning websites quickly.

Multiple Blog Layout

Create customized blog page with Masonry layout, Filterable Gallery and Lightbox. You can create multiple blog pages with different layout and design.

Portfolio

Create beautiful Portfolio or Project pages with Masonry Layout, Filterable Gallery and Ligthbox. Get full control over them and enable/disable what you need.

Premium Templates [Coming Soon]

Kick-start your projects with top quality ready templates and landing pages exclusively built for Flexia Pro. We are working on to bring New stunning templates very soon.

Premium Plugins

Get Access to number of premium plugins bundled with Flexia Pro including Essential Addons for Elementor and Revolution Slider.

Modules

Flexia Pro offers some powerful modules to enable great features for your website. If you don't need any, you can keep them disabled in order to avoid extra assets being loaded on your site.

Preloader

Add beautiful preloader for your website and design them according to your need. You can use your own icon and styles.

Coming Soon Mode

Build stunning coming soon page and set them for your site while you are creating your website or having some maintenance.

WooCommerce Styler

Create advanced shop page with WooCommerce. Get control over shop page, single product and all other Woo pages.

Get Flexia Pro

item.title: Child Theme
item.dc:creator: Rupok
item.content:encoded:
Flexia Child Theme

A child theme is a theme that inherits the functionality of another theme, called the parent theme. Child themes allow you to modify, or add to the functionality of that parent theme instead of modifying the core theme files directly. The problem with modifying core theme files is that your changes are in danger of being overwritten if and when you update the theme to the latest version down the road.

Download Child Theme Generate Child Theme

Setup - How To Setup Child Themes

If you've never setup a child theme before, fear not! It's actually a lot easier than it might sound, especially since we provide you with the foundational tools you'll need to get everything up and running. You can either download the Child Theme from above and install as WordPress theme or you can generate a customized version if you want. In both case, simply install and activate the Child Theme as like any other WordPress and keep Flexia installed.
